altername_name: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons: DragonStrike: DragonLance Dragon Combat Simulator
name: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons: DragonStrike
overview: A dragon flight simulator set in the AD&D world of Dragonlance. Fly dragons through the War of the Lance. When you successfully complete a mission, you can advance in rank, gain magical items and hit points or get a better dragon. The 20 missions include intercepting enemy dragons, destroying enemy ships and protecting the forces of good.
